org.ow2.chameleon.metric.measure
Interface Measure<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of structure stored by the measure
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMeasure, ComposedMeasure, ScalarMeasure, VectorMeasure
public interface Measure<T>

A measure is a MeasuredQuantity taken at a specific time by 'something' or 'someone'. It can contains scalar quantities, vector of quantities or be composed by a set of named quantities. For instance, a voltmeter takes scalar measure; a GPS takes a set of quantities (latitude, longitude...); a gyroscope captures a set of 3 quantities (x,y,z). Measure objects are immutable.

See Also:
ScalarMeasure, ComposedMeasure, VectorMeasure

          The structure of measured quantity.
 Date date()
          Gets the capture time.
 String origin()
